review: its an old game and it has its problems but its part of one of the best gaming series there is compared to other trails games the combat is an improvement graphics are pretty good for its age and the music is fantastic  side quests are a bit boring the npcs this time around dont say much but the main story is pretty solid throughout the whole game even as an intro game thats usually slower  it took me 52 hours to beat but i think they could have cut atleast 15 hours out of it

review: trails of cold steel is a must play for anyone who likes jrpgs with a lot of political drama and anime shenanigans it has a story that to me outshines many of its peers and allows it to stand with them the gameplay is a very smart combo of tactical and traditional turnbased styles with an incredible amount of customization per character thats about all i can say without going into spoilers so if youre a fan of the trails series or jrpgs in general you owe it to yourself to play this game
